entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -19.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 11:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -19.7°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 47 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -28.2°C
Wind: WNW 28 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
